title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 14 'Sharp or Square' with Colin's PICK OF THE YEAR, and 'Fake Q's, Real Answers' on Mahomes and Zion
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - NFL Week 14 'Sharp or Square' with Colin's PICK OF THE YEAR, and 'Fake Q's, Real Answers' on Mahomes and Zion
description:
Colin does "Fake Questions, Real Answers" on why it would be a mistake for Chip Kelly to go back to Oregon (3:00), why he's honored by the blowback he's getting for flip-flopping on Mac Jones (5:00), what Tua has in common with Mac, Teddy and the cardboard box industry (6:00), the lesson to be learned from Patrick Mahomes' struggles (7:00), why Zion was not overhyped (9:00), and what he thinks of the Oklahoma senator who wants to rename a stretch of desolate highway after Lincoln Riley. Then, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if his NFL picks are "sharp" or "square". They give their picks for Bills/Buccaneers (Colin's "Bet of the Year") (17:00), Ravens/Browns (20:00), Rams/Cardinals (22:00), Cowboys/Washington (25:00), Giants/Chargers (28:00), 49ers/Bengals (30:00), Raiders/Chiefs (33:00). and they discuss why they don't regret betting on the Broncos last week against the Chiefs (35:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
